Located in Hami, this 50-megawatt power station is the first solar thermal power station in #Xinjiang. Presently, it is capable of generating an annual power supply of 198.3 million kWh, resulting in a yearly saving of 61,900 tonnes of standard coal.⚡️

要富强 找新疆
Can you imagine #Xinjiang grows rice?
Xinjiang has developed the best experiences in fighting poverty, terrorism while maintaining ethnic harmony across communities.
#LearnFromXinjiangIfYouWishToBeStrong
Ring the "bell" for the harvest of #rice 🌾, which has arrived in Bohu County, northwest China's #Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region.  Check out this stunning golden rice field landscape 💛.

legacy.full_text:
Dubbed "China's Wind Valley," the Dabancheng District, northwest of China's #Xinjang, has an annual #wind #energy 💨⚡️ reserve of 25 billion kilowatt-hours.  Now the district runs entirely on new energy 🔋💚. #NewEnergyMarvelsinXinjiang

result.text: Aksu Prefecture in NW China's #Xinjiang Uyghur Autonomous Region entered apple harvest season. Due to its excellent location, the apples here enjoy sunlight in all four seasons and taste very sweet. In recent years, the apple industry in the area has continued to develop through modern agricultural methods.

legacy.full_text:
🌠🌠Pictures taken on Sunday show the Orionid meteor shower that lit up the sky at Yuli County in northwest #China's Xinjiang Uygur Autonomous Region. 

Well known for brightness and speed, the Orionids are one of the most reliably active annual meteor showers. #ChinaSeen https://t.co/VZX2v1R5NA
